name: Military Copter Showdown
description:
Military Copter Showdown : Dead - Zone

A deadly air attack is approaching you and the Enemy has launched a vicious attack on the front line military base of the super alliance. It’s time to brace yourself and get ready for most brutal air fight with ferocious opponent gunships. Dangerous air attack is approaching you.

Complete missions in Episode mode inspired by real-life conflicts!
Challenge yourself with the next mission or replay a custom mission!

Mass Destruction Aerial Attacks!
3D graphics with flight control simulation!
